description.value:
Trigger You attempt an attack roll, skill check, or saving throw while performing the course of action from your @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Augury]{Augury}, but you haven't rolled yet

You gain a +1 status bonus to the triggering check, or a +2 status bonus if the result of the augury was "woe" and you proceeded anyway.

@Compendium[pf2e.feat-effects.Effect: Brightness Seeker]{Effect: Brightness Seeker}
